title: StageHeaders: after downtime (restore from backup) - no "info-level" logs about CL progress
body:

We have our servers running at Hetzner colocation so we are force to strictly restrict our nodes traffic into private ip addresses with iptables rules. Since our nodes are running in lx-containers behind NAT we restrict those using FORWARD chain. Anyhow that leads to our erigon node not syncing blocks that require lightclient to work. but seems like this issue might not be network related?
